title: WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Seeds Progress
text: April 5, 2018 / 1:24 AM / Updated 25 minutes ago WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Apr 5 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles matches on Wednesday .. Seeds ..
